mapper.select: select m.*, a.renamed_filename from tb_member m join attachment a on m.id = a.member_id join applocation_group g on m.id = g.member_id where a.img_flag = 'P' and g.group_no = #{groupNo}
select renamed_filename from attachment where member_id = #{id} and img_flag = 'P'
select * from applocation_group a join tb_group g using (group_no) where member_id=#{id} and group_accept='Y'
select * from attachment where group_no is not null and img_flag = 'Y'
select * from board where group_no = #{groupNo} order by board_no
select * from board where group_no = #{groupNo} and board_type = 'N' order by board_no
select role from applocation_group where member_id =#{memberId} and group_no =#{groupNo}
select * from schedule where to_char(start_date, 'YYYYMMDD') <= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and to_char(end_date, 'YYYYMMDD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and group_no = #{groupNo}

select b.board_name, b.board_no, b.board_type, p.* from post p join board b on p.board_no = b.board_no where to_char(p.post_reg_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and group_no = #{groupNo} and rownum <= 5 order by post_reg_date desc
